entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Snow level rising to 1500 metres this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 10. POP 60%
